i love this place.  we just landed in barcelona and came straight to pinotxo bar.  i'm glad we missed the lunchtime rush, as we came around 3 pm.  you don't order, but the lovely mr pinotxo suggested items for us.  carne for the boy, pollo for my girlfriend, and pesce for me.  we had no idea what we were going to get.  he started us out w/ some chickpeas and cava too.  for my guy friend, he presented a lovely sausage.  for my girl friend, 2 pieces of stewed chicken w/ dried apricots and prunes.  for me, scrambled eggs w/ asparagus, onions, and shrimp.  everything was fabulous.  i can't wait to go back tmrw!
